82 degrees.  Heavy weeds and lily pads around entire lake.  Center of lake fairly clear of weeds.
Sunny + hazy at times- temp. 72 degrees- SE wind- lake shores heavily weeded- rain yesterday.
78 degrees- south wind- weeds in lake are down considerably in the last 2 weeks.
Calm - no whitecaps - slight breeze - slight rain yesterday.
Cloudy or overcast - calm water - slight breeze.
Steady breeze.  No white caps.  Early am rain (1am) .  Sunny at time of reading.
Full sun. Air temp 74*F. Very slight chop to surface. Surface water temp 70*F.
